heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the District Court (Days and Hours) (August
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the District Court (Days and Hours) (August 

Sittings) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited district court (days hours) (august sittings) order 2022

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on the 1st of August 2022.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on the 1st of August 2022.

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 3. Sittings for the purposes of Article 5(b) of the District Court Areas
text_raw:
3. Sittings for the purposes of Article 5(b) of the District Court Areas 
(Amendment) Order 1970 (S.I. No. 161 of 1970) shall be held during the 
month of August in and for each District Court area referred to in column (2) 
of the table to this Order (in each case serving the relevant District Court 
district mentioned in column (1) of the table immediately opposite such 
reference). Where such sittings are not held on such days, and at such hours 
and at the place for the time being fixed for sittings of the District Court for the 
purpose of transacting the business of the District Court exercising its summary 
jurisdiction in such District Court area by the District Court (Areas) Order 
1961 (S.I. No. 5 of 1961)(as amended)(the “Principal Order”), such sittings 
shall be held on such days, and at such hours referred to in column (3) of the 
table immediately opposite the District Court area referred to in column (2).
text_norm: 3 sitting purpose article 5(b) district court area (amendment) order 1970 (s.i no 161 1970) shall held month august district court area referred column (2) table order (in case serving relevant district court district mentioned column (1) table immediately opposite reference) sitting held day hour place time fixed sitting district court purpose transacting business district court exercising summary jurisdiction district court area district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961)(as amended)(the principal order ) sitting shall held day hour referred column (3) table immediately opposite district court area referred column (2)

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before the commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated.

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order fixes the District Court area within each District Court district in 
which sittings will be held for the purpose of transacting the business of the 
District Court exercising its summary jurisdiction during the month of August
text_norm: explanatory note (this note form part instrument legal interpretation.) order fix district court area within district court district sitting held purpose transacting business district court exercising summary jurisdiction month august
